alert.note: Alert for Northern Park (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 8:49PM MDT until October 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Park. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
